title: Troopers: Teen Shot While Target Shooting in Sullivan County
content:
Read the full story FORKS TOWNSHIP — State police say a teen was shot while target shooting in Sullivan County. Troopers say a 14-year-old boy was target shooting with an 18-year-old man around 4:30 p.m. Saturday along Pleasant Valley Road near Dushore. The 14 year old was shot. The victim was taken to the hospital. There is no word…
